head.description: General Settings for the Battery Applet with Monitoring and Shutdown

refreshInterval-spinner.tooltip: Increase or decrease this spinner value to change the refresh interval - use a slow refresh if you have a slow machine. This also governs the flash speed.

alertPercentage.description: Percentage Battery Charge at which Alert Displayed
alertPercentage.tooltip: Percentage of Battery Charge at which Orange Warning Background is displayed - It is also shown and can be adjusted in the Applet left click menu

displayType.tooltip: This feature offers the Classic (original) display with optional battery icon and some more compact displays suitable for a vertical panel (CompactCompact Plus and Icon Only)

useBatteryLowSound.description: Provide audible alerts when Battery Low and at Shutdown Level
useBatteryLowSound.tooltip: Must have Sox installed. Limited number of sound file types supported (.oga and .wav)

chooseBatteryLowSound.description: Allow choice of audible alert file when Battery Low and at Shutdown Level
chooseBatteryLowSound.tooltip: Must have Sox installed. Limited number of sound file types supported in versions < 4.2

batteryLowSound.description: Choose sound file to use when Battery is Low
batteryLowSound.tooltip: Please ensure the volume is set sensibly in public places especially if a long loud file is specifed

batteryShutdownSound.description: Choose sound file to use when Battery is at Shutdown Level
batteryShutdownSound.tooltip: Please ensure the volume is set sensibly in public places - do not specify a long loud file at Shutdown

notifyBatteryLowSound.description: Provide Notification when user specified sound file is in use - Recommended
notifyBatteryLowSound.tooltip: To remind users that the volume may need to be set sensibly in public places

deleteTempraryFiles.description: Delete temporary files after upgrade to version 1.4
deleteTempraryFiles.tooltip: Versions prior to 1.4 used temporary files in the home directory. These are not needed any more and can be deleted.
